Definition: In this task, you are given a negotiation between two participants. You are to answer 'Yes' if both participants agree to the deal, and 'No' if they do not.
Domains: Commonsense -> Concepts and Relations -> Social Commonsense

Positive Examples.input: THEM: i need the hats and the ball  YOU: i can give you one hat and the ball. i want 2 books and 1 hat  THEM: i have to have both hats and the ball or both hats and a book to make a deal  YOU: sorry, i won`t make a deal without a hat  THEM: if you take 1 hat i have to have everything else  YOU: sorry can`t do  THEM: no deal  YOU: yesh no deal, sorry  THEM: no deal  YOU: no deal.
Positive Examples.explanation: Both participants do not agree to the deal, so the answer is No.

Positive Examples.input: THEM: hi i would like the book and ball and you can have the hats  YOU: i can give you either the book or the ball  THEM: ill take the book  YOU: ok i will take the hats and ball  THEM: deal.
Positive Examples.explanation: Both participants agree to the deal, so the answer is Yes.

Negative Examples.input: THEM: lemme get that book and ball!  YOU: i need 2 balls and a hat  THEM: i'll take the book and two hats then?  YOU: ok.
Negative Examples.explanation: Both participants agree to the deal, so the correct answer is Yes.

Negative Examples.input: THEM: hello. i would like the book and one ball.  YOU: you can have one ball 1 hat  THEM: i need the book or it's no deal.  YOU: no deal i am keeping the book  THEM: ok no deal  YOU: okay sounds good  THEM: alright  YOU: okay  THEM: alright no deal  YOU: okay its no deal.
Negative Examples.explanation: Both participants do not agree to the deal, so the correct answer is No.

Instances.input: THEM: i'll take a hat and two books and you can have the rest if that works for you  YOU: you can have the books ill take the hat and the ball  THEM: i need the hat and at least 1 book to make 6 / 10  YOU: i need the hat and the ball to get 10 / 10  THEM: losing the hat gives me 4 / 10.... the balls are zero points for me  YOU: losing the hat will give me 2 / 10  THEM: guess we cant make this deal work on either side =(  YOU: yup impossible unless one person gets low points glad you understand  THEM: click on no deal then.....  YOU:.... really i didnt know that.

THEM: could i have a ball, a hat, and one book please?  YOU: the ball is key for me, i can give you 2 hats and the books if i can get the ball and 1 hat  THEM: i'm sitting at 4 without that ball, i need all three hats and the books without that ball.  YOU: that would leave me at 4 as well. i could give you the ball and books if i can get the hats  THEM: that would work out very well.
THEM: i would like the hat and the balls  YOU: how about you just take the balls  THEM: no i need the hat and at least 1 ball  YOU: okay you can have the hat and one ball  THEM: deal.

THEM: i'll take the ball you can have the rest  YOU: i need the ball too.  THEM: listen i gave you the hats and book  YOU: you can take the rest. i want the ball.  THEM: nah i dont read or wear hats but ido play ball  YOU: me too.  THEM: look this time you get the ball i get the rest the next time it's mine?  YOU: i already gave a favor last time.
THEM: i just want the balls  YOU: and so you shall have them, if i get the rest  THEM: deal.

THEM: i can offer you the hats  YOU: i can take the ball and 2 hats or the ball and 2 books.  THEM: no i can only offer you the 3 hats or this wont work for me and we say no deal until the button comes up  YOU: fine.  THEM: fine what????  YOU: no deal. three hats only gives me three points. i can't do it.  THEM: fine i can offer you 2 hats  YOU: i can also take the ball and you get everything else.  THEM: now i can offer you no hats  YOU: i can also offer you the ball and i take everything else. 5 points isn't horrendous for me.  THEM: i can offer you one book and 3 hats last offer  YOU: no deal.

THEM: give me ball and hats  YOU: no, i need the ball and two hats  THEM: gimme ball and books  YOU: no, i cannot give you the ball. you can have the books, and maybe one hat  THEM: no deal  YOU: i need the ball and two hats, you can have everything else  THEM: i need ball and books  YOU: i cant give you the ball  THEM: no deal  YOU: no?

THEM: you can have the hats if i can have the ball and book  YOU: how about i take the ball and we split the hats evenly?  THEM: i cannot give up the ball because it is too valuable to me  YOU: i can give you the ball if i get everything else.  THEM: i cannot agree to that as i need the ball and book  YOU: okay, agreed.
